The list included three lake samples from Tibetan Plateau ( one water sample from NMC, two sediments from a KS sediment core, i. e., KS1 and KS2), one lake sediment from Beijing ( SSL), two marine sediments from Yellow Sea ( B43 and B46), one marine sediment from East China Sea ( DHa - 1), and one water sample from South China Sea ( DW03).
